django-polls¶

A Django app to conduct web-based polls.

Installation¶

pip install django-polls

Usage¶

Include the app in INSTALLED_APPS:

INSTALLED_APPS = [
    ...,
    "django_polls",
]

Links to Django¶

You can see Django classes like django.test.TransactionTestCase.

django_polls
